    • registerForCourse

      public String registerForCourse(String username, List<Integer> primaryCourseCodes, List<Integer> alternateCourseCodes)
      Description copied from interface: StudentInterface
      Allows the student to register for courses. The student can specify primary and alternate course codes.
      Specified by:
      registerForCourse in interface StudentInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student registering for the courses.
      primaryCourseCodes - A list of primary course codes the student wants to register for.
      alternateCourseCodes - A list of alternate course codes to be considered if primary choices are unavailable.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the registration attempt.

    • dropCourse

      public boolean dropCourse(String username, int courseCode) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: StudentInterface
      Allows the student to drop a course they are currently registered for.
      Specified by:
      dropCourse in interface StudentInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student who wants to drop the course.
      courseCode - The code of the course to be dropped.
      Returns:
      True if the course was successfully dropped, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while dropping the course.

    • viewGrades

      public List<Map<String,Object>> viewGrades(String username) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: StudentInterface
      Allows the student to view their grades for enrolled courses.
      Specified by:
      viewGrades in interface StudentInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student whose grades are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of maps where each map contains details of grades for the student's enrolled courses.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while retrieving grades.

    • accountInfo

      public Student accountInfo(String username) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: StudentInterface
      Allows the student to view their account information.
      Specified by:
      accountInfo in interface StudentInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student whose account information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Student object containing the student's account details.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while retrieving account information.
